ygData.subject: Where to hunt and research at lvl 20
ygData.msgSnippet: HI all, first of all a question about where to hunt at lvl 20. I have recieved several suggestions and basically narrowed it down two - skarana treants are
ygData.messageBody:
HI all, first of all a question about where to hunt at lvl 20. I have
recieved several suggestions and basically narrowed it down two - skarana
treants are cordelia minister (bard at nkarana wizard spires). I was
wondering what yur guys opinions where? I think perhaps its a good idea to
hunt cordelia until lvl 22 and then head to the treants in south karana-
does that seem sensible, or should i just go ahead and do the treants - and
if so does anyone have any tips for hunting cordelia and/or the treants?
Now, onto questions about research - all ahs been going fine up until now
and i have been researching many spells (infact I have several lvl 16 and
20 nes for sale - any suggestins n where to market them?) but I am having
problems with harmshield which i have failed 4 times! I have trained into
research as much as possible at lvl 20, I have also practiced lt by making
spells and seen no rise so I am guessing it is as high as it will go for my
lvl - why shoudl i fail this spell so often? especially as many ther lvl 20
ones are trivial to me. Also I am finding the words needed fr it difficult
to get - words of refuge are quite common but I have no more words of
absorbtion, they seem t be very rare, and was wondering where the best
place to get lvl 20 and lvl 24 research words (i need the ones for my lvl
24 pet etc.)? Finally, does anyoen have any inf on what the cap is for
research at different lvl's? If nay of you higher lvl necros on solusek ro
could give me a hand getting my spells etc. i would really appreciate it -
thanks in advance - Malados soulkeeper lvl 20 gnomish necro on the Solusek
Ro server.

p.s. please excuse any typos especially those invlving an o r a missing o
as the o key on my keyboard is screwing up
